-const ChatContent = () => {
+import {
+  Box,
+  createStyles,
+  Text
+} from '@mantine/core';
+import { getChat } from '@/stores/ChatAction';
 
+export const ChatContent = () => {
+  const chats = getChat()
+
+  return (
+    <>
+      {
+        chats && chats.message.map((item, index) => {
+          return (
+            <Box key={item.id}>
+              <Text>{item.content}</Text>
+            </Box>
+          )
+        })
+      }
+    </>
+  )
 }

+
+import {
+  Box,
+  createStyles,
+  Text
+} from '@mantine/core';
+import { findChat } from '@/stores/ChatAction';
+import { useChatStore } from '@/stores/ChatStore';
+
+export const ChatContent = () => {
+
+  const activeChatId = useChatStore((state) => state.activeChatId);
+  const activeChats = findChat(activeChatId);
+
+
+  return (
+    <>

+        activeChats && activeChats.message.map((item) => {
+          return (
+            <Box key={item.id}>
+              <Text>{item.content}</Text>
+            </Box>
+          )
+        })
+      } */}
+    </>
+  )
+}
